text: almost any relationship starts with the
fireworks you know this is wonderful
this is amazing
and then you have the honeymoon phase
and then you enter real life what is the
one single thing that makes
relationships work it's working to build
that emotional connection and to keep
that connection alive
you know when for example one of you
comes in and says oh wow I just had this
happen at work how does the other
respond do they go great and here's what
I did or do they turn toward you and
listen acknowledge a proceed it's not
the big moments that make a relationship
work it's the everyday that makes your
relationship work are you really there
and attentive and listening and
appreciative of that other person or are
you taking them for granted that may
work one year down the road five years
10 years 15 research is very clear your
relationship will erode if you forget
about appreciation your relationship
will thrive if you work toward building
that emotional connection but how do you
appreciate as you and your partner are
interacting you're talking every single
day listen attentively try and find the
value in what they're saying let them
know you know I hear what you're saying
it sounds like a tough day that is what
makes your relationship work not just
buying your spouse or your romantic
partner roses on Valentine's Day it is
being there emotionally with them every
day listening partnering with them
empathizing with their difficulties
their challenges and joining with them
to celebrate their successes as well
